title: Microsoft Corp. stock outperforms competitors despite losses on the day
text:
Shares of Microsoft Corp. 
        MSFT,
        -0.17%
       slipped 0.07% to $370.60 Wednesday, on what proved to be an all-around rough trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        +0.11%
       falling 0.80% to 4,704.81 and Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       falling 0.76% to 37,430.19. This was the stock's second consecutive day of losses. Microsoft Corp. closed $13.70 below its 52-week high ($384.30), which the company achieved on November 29th. The stock demonstrated a mixed performance when compared to some of its competitors Wednesday, as Apple Inc. 
        AAPL,
        -1.06%
       fell 0.75% to $184.25, Alphabet Inc. Cl C 
        GOOG,
        +0.21%
       rose 0.57% to $140.36, and Alphabet Inc. Cl A 
        GOOGL,
        +0.04%
       rose 0.54% to $138.92. Trading volume (21.8 M) remained 5.4 million below its 50-day average volume of 27.2 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights, an automation technology provider, using data from Dow Jones and FactSet.  See our market data terms of use.
